profile:
Environova Planning Group Inc. and Maritime Landscape Services Ltd offers full landscape planning, design and arboriculture services for commercial, institutional and residential customers throughout the Annapolis Valley, Metro Halifax and the South Shore of Nova Scotia. Environova Planning Group Inc.


The owner and founder of both companies, Stan Kochanoff is a Registered Consulting and ISA Certified Arborist, a Licensed Professional Planner and a Certified Red Seal Landscape Horticulturist with over 46 years of experience in the Maritime Landscape Industry. Stan is a graduate of the Niagara Parks School of Horticulture’s 3 year diploma program in Ornamental Horticulture in Niagara Falls, Ontario receiving his NDP diploma in 1962. In 1966, he completed a 4 year BS degree program in Ornamental Horticulture and Landscape Design at Cornell University in Ithaca, New York. At Cornell he was awarded the Dreer Scholarship for travel and directed practice in the UK, Denmark, Germany and the Netherlands.

*Why Choose Us?
-We are Professional
Environova Planning Group Inc. and Maritime Landscape Services Ltd offers full landscape planning, design and arboriculture services for commercial, institutional and residential customers throughout the Annapolis Valley, Metro Halifax and the South Shore of Nova Scotia.

-On Time
Our expertise and attention to detail has enabled us to consistently deliver quality landscape design, construction and maintenance services at competitive prices to our clients before time.

-Quality Assurance
We offer landscape maintenance consulting services for residential, institutional and commercial clients including assessments of your landscapes and can provide you with landscape maintenance specifications for your property if you are contracting out work.
name: Maritime Landscape Services Ltd.
